extracted_metadata.title: Return Conference \ Zochrot \ Panel: "Return Now?" \ 30-09-2013 \ Tel Aviv \ English Dubbing
extracted_metadata.description: ***From Truth to Redress: Realizing the Return of Palestinian Refugees International Conference in Tel Aviv, September 29-30 2013*** Return Now? From Political Consciousness to Planning the Return Chair: Eitan Bronstein - Zochrot. The right of return in Palestinian political consciousness in Israel / Areej Sabbagh-Khoury Return(s) in the oral histories of the Palestinian exiles / Dominika Blachnicka al-Lajun - Between Memory and Innovation: Planning and Demonstration of the Reconstructed Village Center / Shadi Habib-Allah - Architect, Ein Mahal. Respondent / Dr. Haim Yacobi -- Architect and planner *** Read more about the conference: http://zochrot.org/en/menu/%D7%96%D7%... *** To watch the panel in Hebrew: • כנס השיבה / זוכרות / פאנל: "שיבה עכשיו? מת... To watch the panel in Arabic: • مؤتمر العودة / ذاكرات - جلسة: "العودة الآن...
